Name: speech-language disorder-1
Definition: A speech disorder characterized by severe orofacial dyspraxia resulting in largely incomprehensible speech that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in FOXP2 on 7q31.1.

Name: articulation disorder
Definition: A speech disorder that involves mispronouncing speech sounds by omitting

Name: echolalia
Definition: A speech disorder that involves the automatic repetition of vocalizations made by another person.

Name: mutism
Definition: A speech disorder that involves a complete inability to speak.
